Source.Name: libressl-shim
Source.Description: This library is provided to assist the Solus 'linux-steam-integration' project in securing games by forcing them to use an updated version of LibreSSL which they may be vendoring in-tree.

Package.Name: libressl-shim
Package.Description: This library is provided to assist the Solus 'linux-steam-integration' project in securing games by forcing them to use an updated version of LibreSSL which they may be vendoring in-tree.
